item.title: CVE-2024-27194|2024-03-16T01:22:52.438Z -- Andrei Ivasiuc -- Fontific | Google Fonts
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Andrei Ivasiuc Fontific | Google Fonts allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Fontific | Google Fonts: from n/a through 0.1.6.
